author: dkhaywood
msg: JavaSpecification - Calling ConsentAbstract#create factory method (rather than Veto#create ... which
suggests a Veto might be created whereas in fact it is possible for an Allow to be created based on the

author: dkhaywood
msg: JavaDomainObjectContainerInjector - can optionally specify the JavaDomainObjectContainer in its constructor (for testing) - else will instantiate one itself, as it previously did.

author: dkhaywood
msg: JavaDomainObjectContainer - factored out getObjectPersistor etc, but they still look up from singleton so no change in behaviour.

author: dkhaywood
msg: JavaReflectorInstaller - hook method to allow subclasses to create their own subclass (in turn) of JavaReflector.  Needed for reintroduction of User Interaction Testing (nee XAT2)

author: dkhaywood
msg: JavaReflector - can now optionally take a NakedObjectConfiguration in its constructor (for testing) - else looks up lazily from singleton just as it has always done.
